summary:
This mod adds a little Shack you can claim for yourself. It's just outside of Riverwood behind the Saw Mill on the other side of the River. It includes a Bed and a no respawn Chest. There is also a special surprise for Cannibals in the Basement. Includes new Kidnapping feature.

Very handy if you are just beginning your Journey and
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description:[/u] 

This mod adds a little Shack you can claim for yourself. It's just outside of Riverwood behind the Saw Mill on the
other side of the River. It includes a Bed and a no respawn Chest and
some other Sacks to store all your Stuff. There is also a special
surprise for Cannibals in the Basement. 

Very handy if you are just beginning your Journey and need a safe place to store your belongings. 
Or if you are a Cannibal and/or enjoy punching people in the face. 

Should be compatible with every mod because it just adds stuff and doesn't
remove anything. If it isn't please tell me and I will try to adjust
things. 

Btw. I'm still gonna update this Mod so any ideas/wishes are very welcome.






15.03 Update2: Release Spell, Vivisection Dagger with Msg. 

15.03 Update: little Quest and new Armor Set 

14.03 Update: Vivisection Dagger (Tutorial down below) 

12.03 Update: Kidnapping Spell (be sure not to be detected while casting) 

10.03 Update: 3 new recepies 




[u]Tutorial Vivisection Dagger:[/u] 

you first have to learn the Spell Vivisection knowledge found in a Book upstairs (it will not appear in you Skill menu) Once you learn propper vivisection you need to grab yourself one of the 2 Vivisection Daggers (the one with an " ! " at the end of the description text has a little Message when you harvest Meat) and start Chopping one of your Victims (they still have to be alive) the Meat will be added to your inventory. 






[u]Please note [/u]
- Please excuse any bugs. If you report them I'll try to fix it right away. 
- There is a secound Ring of Namira found in a Chest downstairs. If you use it dont equipt the Ring of Namira you get through the quest this will resault in both of them not working anymore.
author: Schmornoff
